name: Ambulance Race & Rescue Adventure Sim 3D
description:
Drive your favorite ambulance and awesome custom emergency vehicles in an open 3D city! Speed to the hospital, help rescue patients, and become a little doctor! Race your ambulance, hit jumps at the stunt track, or take it through a bubbling car wash!

Download the Ambulance Adventure Race & Rescue today!

Game Features

+ AMBULANCE SIMULATOR - Super fun ambulance game in an activity filled 3D city! Drive different vehicles on different missions and activities!

+ RESCUE YOUR PATIENTS – Diagnose illness with stethoscope, thermometer, and EKG. Scan with x-rays, and pick just the right treatments!

+ STUNTS AND RACES – Drive to the stadium for awesome monster stunts or race opponents on the track for record times!

+ LOTS OF VEHICLE AND COLOR COMBINATIONS – Try out colors on your favorite emergency vehicle. Unlock new faster and more powerful vehicles by completing objectives!

+ DESIGNED FOR ALL AGES - Easy, clear button controls for little fingers with helpful hints and guidance!

+ CODED VELOCITY PROMISE - Our paid games always give the full game with NO ads and NO additional purchases!

Download Ambulance Adventure Race & Rescue to experience the exciting life of an ambulance driver!

If you liked our ambulance sim then you will love our other kids games! Download our Construction Build & Play, our Dolphin Swim & Play, or blast aliens in Alien Annihilator!

Follow us on Facebook for more super fun kids games!
